pages.title: Whisk
pages.text: A {b whisk} is a powered blender used for {(beverage_basics)beverage making}.

pages.title: GUI Components
pages.text: The GUI of whisks is complicated, but in turn demonstrates the high customizability of beverages in Convivium.;; In the right column of the GUI, four {em input slots}, a {em container slot}, an {em output slot}, and a {em fluid tank} can be operated as they are supposed to react.;; Above and below the fluid tank, a {em rotary force indicator} and a {em heat indicator} show whether the whisk is powered (required for working) or heated (required only by certain recipes.).;; Buttons at the bottom toggle redstone control and manual switch of {em heat insulation}. Heat-insulated whisk will not heat the fluid inside even if being heated itself, which is usually more convenient than toggling the heat sources.

The left column of the GUI are split into three horizontal sectors, respectively showing a reference of {(beverage_basics/tastes)Tastes}, the {(beverage_basics/sways)Sway(s)} that is/are taking effect in the current beverage, and the Sway(s) that can be reached by further adjustments to the beverage.
For further information about how to brew a beverage, see entries under the category {(beverage_basics)Beverage Basics} for details.
